attributes.action: Legislate to impose a minimum five year custodial sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: upon any person who while driving a motor vehicle, knocks down a person and fails to stop. To impose a minimum ten year custodial sentence, if the consequent injuries result in the death of the victim. To impose a minimum two year custodial sentence, If the driver or any other adult travelling within the vehicle do not call for medical assistance. As the present law does not impose sufficient penalties in some cases where death or serious injury has occurred as a result of a road traffic incident.
